name: Law Offices of R. Stephen McNally Reviews

review.title: “Questionable senior leadership”
review.pros: Pros – It's a relatively laid-back environment. Time off is available, and the office isn't as stressful as that of many other law firms.
review.cons: Cons – Questionable competence of senior attorneys.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
